article_title: Dover man advocates for Constitution outside of City Hall
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: DOVER — Standing for his Second Amendment right to bear arms, and for Constitutional values, Dover resident Stephen Page staged a peaceful demonstration outside of City Hall for most of the day Saturday.He was peaceful and respectful, as were the handful of supporters who came out to stand with him. Page was openly armed and carrying a placard announcing his Second Amendment right. He said his reason for being there was the importance of encouraging citizens to learn more about their
article_metadata.author: Karen Dandurant  news@fosters.com
